Question
========

Two variables X and Y were measured to 8 individuals. From these, one calculated the following:Ê n = 8\ ΣX = 40 ΣX^2^ = 210 ΣY = 48 ΣY^2^ = 300 ΣXY = 230 When we want to test bilaterally with α = 0.01 the hypothesis that in the population there is no correlation between X and Y, the boundaries of the critical area

Answerlist
----------

* ± 0.7646
* ± 0.8095
* ± 0.8343
* ± 0.8571

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

± 0.7646: Incorrect ± 0.8095: Incorrect ± 0.8343: Correct ± 0.8571: Incorrect
